title: BRIEF-ReShape Lifesciences Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.36
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - ReShape Lifesciences Inc:
* RESHAPE LIFESCIENCES ANNOUNCES RECORD REVENUE FOR FIRST QUARTER 2018
* Q1 REVENUE $950,000 * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.36 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
